column4: is software for pdf annotations available on ubuntu? I tried evince and okular so far. evince only can do text annotations. okular has at least a highlight function and basic drawing tools, but it can't save to pdf. any alternatives?
you need a pdf editor, or just something that annotates?
annotations mostly, text marking. simple drawing would be nice.
k - look like hateball know what he's talking about, so i'll sidle off...
